data.lyric:
[ti:Silent Night]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:My Gift]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Silent Night - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:10.25]Lyrics by：Traditional
[00:20.50]Composed by：Traditional
[00:30.76]Silent night holy night
[00:39.14]All is calm all is bright
[00:47.24]Round yon Virgin mother and child
[00:55.41]Holy infant so tender and mild
[01:03.56]Sleep in heavenly peace
[01:11.71]Sleep in heavenly peace
[01:19.99]Silent night holy night
[01:28.10]Shepherds quake at the sight
[01:36.29]Glories stream from heaven afar
[01:44.55]Heavenly hosts sing 'Alleluia
[01:52.71]Christ the Savior is born
[02:00.87]Christ the Savior is born
[02:21.34]Silent night holy night
[02:29.49]Son of God love's pure light
[02:37.71]Radiant beams from Thy holy face
[02:45.92]With the dawn of redeeming grace
[02:54.06]Jesus Lord at Thy birth
[03:02.45]Jesus Lord at Thy birth
data.trans:
[ti:Silent Night]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:My Gift]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.25]//
[00:20.50]//
[00:30.76]平安夜 圣善夜
[00:39.14]真宁静 真光明
[00:47.24]圣光环绕圣母圣婴
[00:55.41]圣洁婴孩纯真可爱
[01:03.56]尽享天赐安眠
[01:11.71]尽享天赐安眠
[01:19.99]平安夜 圣善夜
[01:28.10]牧羊人 在旷野
[01:36.29]看见天上荣光降下
[01:44.55]齐唱哈路利亚
[01:52.71]主耶稣已降生
[02:00.87]主耶稣已降生
[02:21.34]平安夜 圣善夜
[02:29.49]神子爱 光皎洁 
[02:37.71]这是救恩黎明光芒
[02:45.92]救赎恩典降临四方
[02:54.06]主耶稣已降生
[03:02.45]主耶稣已降生
